verses.roman:
'mora antara-vārtā rūpa jānila kemane?'
svarūpa kahe--'jāni, kṛpā kariyācha āpane

synonyms: mora antara-vārtā—My internal intentions; rūpa—Rūpa Gosvāmī; jānila—knew; kemane—how; svarūpa kahe—Svarūpa replied; jāni—I can understand; kṛpā kariyācha—You have bestowed Your mercy; āpane—personally.
translation: How could Rūpa Gosvāmī have understood My heart?" the Lord asked. Svarūpa Dāmodara replied, "I can understand that You have already bestowed Your causeless mercy upon him.
